role.argrole: person arg0 does plastic surgery to

(IP (NP-TPC (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TPC (NN 女性)) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (PP-LGS (P 由) (NP (NN 丈夫) (CC 或) (NN 男友))) (VP (VV 陪伴)))) (VP (VV 来) (VP (VV 整型))))) (DEC 的)))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (LCP (NP (NN 术)) (LC 後)) (NP (NN 情况))) (VP (ADVP (AD 通常)) (ADVP (AD 比较)) (VP (VA 好))))
